Name: Becoming
About the game: A self-centered man faces his beliefs when the past comes back to haunt him in the form of a very close friend... 'Becoming' is a romantic drama told using sound novel game mechanics and featuring 3D rendered images. It's gameplay is based on decisions, some leading to a different ending for the main character, while other choices will add more details about a specific event.
